TopicTitle: Kerbal: Spassi Ishosh yi Aton (Kerbstomp Edition on Reddit)

Articles.Content:
Some of you might remember back in January, this crazy guy naming himself "featherwinglove" starting (to the tune of 28 chapters) a story named Kerbal: Spassi Ishosh yi Aton (Kerbal: Space Welcomes You). Maybe you liked it, maybe not. It no longer exists here because of the April crash, and neither it, nor its reboot, the Kerbstomp Edition will be posted on this forum due to more recent problems I've had with this forum's moderation. Here's the link to where it is actually going up on Reddit:

http://redd.it/1rgldc

If you're interested in the original version, which falls off at Chapter 28, I'm open to zipping up my original files and dropbox'ing them. Please send me a gmail if you'd like me to do that.
How do you translate to Kerbic? MUST KNOW THE SECRET!

How do you translate to Kerbic? MUST KNOW THE SECRET!

Reverse Spanish

Okay, zipped up the old story and put it here:

https://www.4shared.com/zip/U2vbZu9o/Story.html

It includes only the last (once published) versions of the stories, and several previously unpublished support files (flight logs mostly), including one to partly answer Zuni's question: what little I've developed regarding the kerbal language for K:SIyA (btw, the official Squad videos really are in reversed Spanish!)

As for the Reddit story, please vote it up if you think more people should read it. Reddit doesn't make it easy to find.
